name: Teachers. With Love and Passion.
description:
It's time to start your new life as a teacher at the local school!

You worked hard to get here and prove that you are worth reaching your goals. However, nothing prepared you for what you are about to see...

Who would say that such a normal job would drop you in a den of hot single teachers ready to fall in love with you?

Make decisions and get to know them. But be careful! They all have secrets, and your answers may change your love life forever.

This is your chance to live a sweet and lovely school romance all over again.


The content may be inappropriate for audiences under 13. 

This game contains mild swearing, mentions of alcohol, and stalking.

Player discretion is advised.


  • MC's Customizable Name
  • 5 Love Interests (4 available)
  • 70k words (5~7 hours of full gameplay)
  • 9 endings
  • CG Gallery
  • Endings' Walkthrough

  • Self-voicing and ALT text for images
  • Audio description/subtitles
  • RenPy's accessibility menu for font features

All music and SFX are CC/Public domain!

  • Press ENTER, LEFT CLICK, or SPACE to proceed through the story
  • Press V to enable Self-voicing
  • Press A to open RenPy's font accessibility menu
  • Press H to hide the dialogue box
  • Press S to take screenshots
